subject: DOWNLOAD PHOTOSHOP CS3 ONLY $89
body:
Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
Education is the path from cocky ignorance to miserable uncertainty.
Children are a great comfort to us in our old age, and they help us reach it faster too.
Dogs come when they are called cats take a message and get back to you.
A heart well prepared for adversity in bad times hopes, and in good times fears for a change in fortune.
That which makes people dissatisfied with their condition, is the chimerical idea they form of the happiness of others.
An actress must never lose her ego  --  without it she has no talent.
A novel must be exceptionally good to live as long as the average cat.
I wept not, so to stone within I grew.
Danger and delight grow on one stalk.
Do not always prove yourself to be the one in the right. The right will appear. You need only give it a chance.
When thou art above measure angry, bethink thee how momentary is man's life.
Self-respect is the root of discipline the sense of dignity grows with the ability to say no to oneself.
Taking a new step, uttering a new word, is what people fear most.
Divorce is a game played by lawyers.
Authors like cats because they are such quiet, lovable, wise creatures, and cats like authors for the same reasons.
We believe that the applause of silence is the only kind that counts.
Each has his own tree of ancestors, but at the top of all sits Probably Arboreal.
Take the attitude of a student, Never be to big to ask questions, Never know to much to learn something new.
